artist: Editor: Jeremy Schonfield; Publisher: Facsimile Editions, London
creditline: Gift of Hermann Mark Lissauer, Melbourne Australia
description: Leather-bound volume; facsimile of manuscript leaves; 322 pages, 161 folios; 138 illuminated pages, with raised and flat gold metallic leaf applied by hand, powdered gold and silver
medium: Color lithographs with raised and flat gold metallic leaf and powdered gold and silver, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Hermann Mark Lissauer, Melbourne, Australia; given to MIA, 1999.
title: The Barcelona Haggadah (Manuscript facsimile)
